The two "Property Name" entities identified in the paragraph are "maxima absorption values" and "red - shift". These entities are mentioned as properties of the substance PCDSeBT, with the first one being compared between the film and solution forms of the substance, and the second one being mentioned as absent in the film form.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| maxima absorption values |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have found that only one clear "Material Property" entity is mentioned. The "maxima absorption values" refers to a property of the substance PCDSeBT, specifically in its film form. The other entity, "red - shift", is not a material property in this context, but rather a description of a change in the absorption values. Therefore, only "maxima absorption values" is presented in the table.
